page.title: 17ATTITUDES IN HOLMER GREEN
page.content: Through our questionnaire we discovered that most people moved into the area for the following reasons,good schools, friendly atmosphere,relatives living near by.Houses were comparitively cheap ,well built,they were close to business and near to the countryside.Most people like living in Holmer Green.Three people didn't like living in Holmer Green because of the lack of entertainment in the village itself. In response to the question:"Do you believe in God?" approximately 12% replied "No",18%,"Don't know" and 68% "Yes"and many of these would call themselves religious,although only one fifth actually belonged to a church. There were no professed members of faiths other than Christianity in our sample.Of those who did attend church the majority felt it important to live out their faith in daily life.
